column5: When traveling, you often see stores that herald "Trading Post" "Olde Trading Post" etc...and today I got to wondering...has anyone went in and actually tried to trade an item they have for something in the store?  I imagine the person behind the counter would be dumbfounded...
Well they seem to limited to what they can trade with...So far they only accept paper, metal discs and plastic.   Art
i hear ya, like i went to the dollar store today, and they refused to sell me a dollar someone should put a stop to this
